header: Land Is Given to Ephraim and Manasseh

verse: The tribes of Manasseh and Ephraim were from the family line of Joseph. So they received that land as their share.
Here is the territory given to the tribe of Ephraim, according to its family groups.
The people of Ephraim didnâ€™t drive out the Canaanites living in Gezer. The Canaanites live among the people of Ephraim to this day. But they are forced to work hard for the people of Ephraim.
